headline.main: Mental Exam Ordered for Man Charged in Daughter's Death
headline.print_headline: Mental Exam Ordered for Man Charged in Daughter's Death

docs.snippet: An Alabama man accused of killing his 21-month-old daughter with a small hatchet has been ordered to undergo a mental exam to determine if he's fit to stand trial....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Alabama man accused of killing his 21-month-old daughter with a small hatchet has been ordered to undergo a mental exam to determine if he's fit to stand trial.

headline.main: Utah Teen Charged in Gunman Hoax That Brought SWAT to School
headline.print_headline: Utah Teen Charged in Gunman Hoax That Brought SWAT to School

docs.snippet: A Utah teenager accused of triggering a massive police response and a 2-hour lockdown with a made-up story about an armed man at his school is facing a misdemeanor false-alarm charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah teenager accused of triggering a massive police response and a 2-hour lockdown with a made-up story about an armed man at his school is facing a misdemeanor false-alarm charge.

headline.main: For Republicans, Contested 1976 Convention Looms Over 2016 Race

docs.snippet: Donald J. Trump’s dominance in the polls combined with a cluster of second-place candidates looking to topple him has Republicans thinking their convention next summer could be a nerve-racking get-together reminiscent of 1976....
docs.abstract: Donald J. Trump’s dominance in the polls combined with a cluster of second-place candidates looking to topple him has Republicans thinking their convention next summer could be a nerve-racking get-together reminiscent of 1976.

headline.main: Family of Black Man Slain by Police Sues San Francisco
headline.print_headline: Family of Black Man Slain by Police Sues San Francisco
